name: Insane Driver
description:
Insane Driver brings Career Mode with underground street racing challenges. The game modes are Duel, Challenge, Against Time, Takedown and Drift, the enemies of the CPU ensures that you will have work to win each challenge, the night missions will challenge your skills to the limit, drive from classics to racing trucks, be it on a road or airport the adrenaline is sure!  

Come and be part of the Insane Driver world and become the King of Asphalt.  

Keys

 A W S D - to drive 

C - change camera 

Esc - pause
